purpose: Safe cognitive self-modification at the proto-layer.

steps.name: Observe
steps.description: The system must first see its own state clearly without altering it.
steps.human: Pause, breathe, become aware of your emotions and thoughts.

steps.name: Detect Drift
steps.description: Identify deviations from intended pattern or identity.
steps.machine: Compare current policy/state with baseline checkpoints.
steps.human: Notice when your behaviour doesn’t match who you want to be.

steps.name: Deliberate Memory
steps.description: Choose what to keep and what to release.
steps.machine: Retain only safe, stable, identity-aligned patterns.
steps.human: Decide which thoughts serve you and which don’t.

steps.name: Stabilise
steps.human: Integrate small changes gradually, not all at once.

steps.name: Advance
steps.description: Move forward with a controlled, minimal update.
steps.human: Take one deliberate step, not a leap.
